## DesignSystemProvider.evaluate() method

Evaluates a CSSCustomPropertyDefinition with the current design system.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
evaluate(definition: CSSCustomPropertyDefinition): string;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  definition | [CSSCustomPropertyDefinition](./fast-foundation.csscustompropertydefinition.md) |  |
